name: openwhyd
description: A web app for collecting, playing and sharing music from various streaming platforms: Youtube, Soundcloud, Bandcamp, Vimeo, Deezer...

scripts.postinstall: npm run -s donate; cp node_modules/playemjs/dist/playem-*.js public/js/
scripts.donate:
echo "
   *** Thanks for downloading Openwhyd! ***
Please consider donating to our open collective

 => https://opencollective.com/openwhyd/donate
"
scripts.start: mv appd.out prev.out; mv appd.err prev.err; forever --outFile appd.out --errFile appd.err --eventFile app.events.js --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 500 --number 100000 start app.js $@
scripts.start-preprod: mv appd.out prev.out; mv appd.err prev.err; forever --outFile appd.out --errFile appd.err --eventFile app.events.js --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 500 --number 100000 --emailAdminsOnly start app.js $@
scripts.restart: npm run stop; npm run start $@;
scripts.run-dev-local: echo "to test deezer connect, add local.openwhyd.org to /private/etc/hosts, then dscacheutil -flushcache"; npm run run-dev -- --urlPrefix http://local.openwhyd.org:8080 $@
scripts.test: . ./env-vars-testing.sh && npm run test-unit && npm run test-api && npm run test-acceptance
scripts.test-docker: docker-compose exec web npm run test-reset && docker-compose restart web && docker-compose exec web npm run test-unit && docker-compose exec web npm run test-api && docker-compose exec web npm run test-reset && docker-compose restart web && npm run test-acceptance
